Welcome to stockservice’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Data Classes¶

class stockservice.stock.Stock(id, ticker, exchange, last, last_trade_date, last_trade_time, change, percent_change)¶

A structured representation of stock information, including ticker symbol, latest sale price, and price change since yesterday.

__init__(id, ticker, exchange, last, last_trade_date, last_trade_time, change, percent_change)¶

Creates a new Stock

Parameters:
  • self (Stock) – This object
  • id (int) – The unique ID number for this ticker symbol
  • ticker (string) – The Ticker Symbol (e.g. AAPL)
  • exchange (string) – The name of the exchange (e.g. NASDAQ)
  • last (float) – The latest sale price for this stock.
  • last_trade_date (string) – The entire date of the last trade.
  • last_trade_time (string) – The time of the last trade.
  • change (float) – The price change since yesterday.
  • percent_change (float) – The percent price change since yesterday.
Returns:

Stock

Raw JSON Service¶

stockservice.raw_json.connect()¶

Connect to the online data source in order to get up-to-date information.

Returns:void
stockservice.raw_json.disconnect()¶

Connect to the local cache, so no internet connection is required.

Returns:void
stockservice.raw_json.get_stock_information(ticker)¶

Retrieves current stock information.

Parameters:ticker (string) – A comma separated list of ticker symbols (e.g. “AAPL, MSFT, CSCO”).
Returns:string
stockservice.raw_json.get_stock_information_async(callback, error_callback, ticker)¶

Asynchronous version of get_stock_information

Parameters:
  • callback (function) – Function that consumes the data (string) returned on success.
  • error_callback (function) – Function that consumes the exception returned on failure.
  • ticker (string) – A comma separated list of ticker symbols (e.g. “AAPL, MSFT, CSCO”).
Returns:

void

Structured Data Service¶

stockservice.structured.connect()¶

Connect to the online data source in order to get up-to-date information.

Returns:void
stockservice.structured.disconnect()¶

Connect to the local cache, so no internet connection is required.

Returns:void
stockservice.structured.get_stock_information(ticker)¶

Retrieves current stock information.

Parameters:ticker (string) – A comma separated list of ticker symbols (e.g. “AAPL, MSFT, CSCO”).
Returns:list
stockservice.structured.get_stock_information_async(callback, error_callback, ticker)¶

Asynchronous version of get_stock_information

Parameters:
  • callback (function) – Function that consumes the data (a list) returned on success.
  • error_callback (function) – Function that consumes the exception returned on failure.
  • ticker (string) – A comma separated list of ticker symbols (e.g. “AAPL, MSFT, CSCO”).
Returns:

void

Object-Oriented Regular Service¶

stockservice.regular.connect()¶

Connect to the online data source in order to get up-to-date information.

Returns:void
stockservice.regular.disconnect()¶

Connect to the local cache, so no internet connection is required.

Returns:void
stockservice.regular.get_stock_information(ticker)¶

Retrieves current stock information.

Parameters:ticker (string) – A comma separated list of ticker symbols (e.g. “AAPL, MSFT, CSCO”).
Returns:listof Stock
stockservice.regular.get_stock_information_async(callback, error_callback, ticker)¶

Asynchronous version of get_stock_information

Parameters:
  • callback (function) – Function that consumes the data (a listof Stock) returned on success.
  • error_callback (function) – Function that consumes the exception returned on failure.
  • ticker (string) – A comma separated list of ticker symbols (e.g. “AAPL, MSFT, CSCO”).
